description: This Dart source file defines the ApiClient class, which provides a singleton interface for managing a Dio HTTP client instance configured with base options, interceptors for authentication and logging, and methods to reset or reconfigure the client.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A utility class providing access to a configured Dio HTTP client instance for API communication.

methods.name: instance
methods.description: Provides a singleton Dio instance configured with base options and interceptors.

methods.name: configure
methods.description: Recreates and reconfigures the Dio client with optional onUnauthorized callback.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the Dio client instance, allowing reinitialization.
